price: 51. Midkood hadlaya baa odhan; Waxaan anigu lahaa saaxiib.
arabic: قَالَ قَآئِلٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ إِنِّي كَانَ لِي قَرِينٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla qāilun min'hum innī kāna lī qarīnun
